title: About Company
hometitle: Red Sea Detergents Company stands out as a giant company
homeTitle_p: In the field of manufacturing cleaning powders
about_p: The Red Sea Detergents Company stands out as a giant company in the field of manufacturing cleaning powders after it has firmly established itself... and in its successful journey since its founding in 1984 AD, it has not been immune from keeping pace with developments. It has expanded its production capacity in two stages, using its production mechanism to keep pace with developments and expansions. In the markets to meet internal and external needs, the products are packed according to the latest high-end packaging machines
product_p: Our products are the best products in the local and foreign markets
brand_p: Our brand in domestic and foreign markets
